title: RIOT you should consider your grading system

replies.body: You only posted your KDA, but things like warding, cs and objective takedown participation weights more towards score than KDA. It's really ironic that people focus on KDA when they complain about scoring when trying to get people away from the KDA mindset was what Riot intended to accomplish with the scoring system in the first place.
But im not even complaining i just think its funny and yes form my pov he did participate very well in the game but maybe your right about focusing only on K.D.A
Why?  Grading isn't based on K/D.  K/D is largely irrelevant to performance in this game.
But it helps you to get mastery tokens and chests

Yes, S grades do give tokens and chests.

But K/D has nothing to do with how well a player plays which is why grades are not determined by the K/D ratio.
I know that doesnt mean he hes good or bad but i think a S+ was the right grade it could be easier for him to obtain tokens
